Class ARGLikelihood

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel

All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable, Likelihood, Model, ModelListener, ParallelLikelihood, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class ARGLikelihood
extends AbstractARGLikelihood

ARGLikelihood - implements a Likelihood Function for sequences on an ancestral recombination graph.
